title: Quality Assurance Testing Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive testing capability that validates system functionality, performance, and reliability through automated and manual testing processes.
iWant: a complete testing suite that covers all application components
soThat: I can ensure software quality and identify defects before production deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Testing suite includes unit, integration, and system test coverage
Test results provide clear pass/fail status with detailed reporting
Failed tests include error descriptions and reproduction steps
Test execution time does not exceed 15 minutes for complete suite
